item.title: As more customers default on BNPL loans, Klarna’s CEO predicts AI will cause a recession
item.description: Sebastian Siemiatkowski foresees mass AI-induced headcount reductions among white collar workers.

item.title: SINKs need to earn at least $81,000 to live comfortably in America’s cheapest state—the most expensive require an $120,000 salary
item.description: Hawaii is the state where single adults need to earn the most to feel financially comfortable, while West Virginia is the most affordable.

item.title: Amazon’s MGM is reportedly making a film about Sam Altman being kicked out of OpenAI
item.description: Artificial has yet to be cast, but big names are circling.

item.title: Milan Kovac ran Elon Musk’s most important project: What the departure of the Optimus head means for Tesla
item.description: “This one hits different. You’re in the Tesla hall of fame, brother,” wrote one senior Tesla manager.

item.title: Exclusive: Coinbase vets raise $30 million for crypto wallet startup Turnkey
item.description: The fundraise attracted big VC names like Bain Capital Crypto, Sequoia Capital and Lightspeed Faction.
